QuestData.Title: Introductions Are in Order
QuestData.Description: The Forsaken are right on our heels and now these ogres are trying to flank us, $n.$B$BThey're servants of the ettin Koroth -- the meanest, most destructive force in all of Gilneas.$B$BIf we can bait Koroth into charging the Forsaken's forward force, we should be able to cover our retreat and buy some time.$B$BThe only way this can work is if we make Koroth furious. It won't be enough to just kill his minions. We need to swipe his most prized possession, a tiger-skinned banner.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Ogre Minions and obtain Koroth's Banner in Koroth's Den.
QuestData.RewardText: You definitely got the ettin angry, $n. I heard him myself.$B$BLet's hope this works.
